content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(6.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric pole (position 6.5, 0.5)
- Electric pole (position 13.5, 10.5)
- Electric pole (position 14.5, 9.5)
- Electric pole (position 13.5, 12.5)
- Electric pole (position 10.5, 13.5)
- Electric pole (position 12.5, 13.5)

### Copper plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 12
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - Status: EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT, Fuel: 6
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0) - Status: EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 20
- Chest (position 5.5, 0.5) - Inventory: {'iron-plate': 160}

### Lab at position(5, 0)
Consists of:
- Lab (position 5, 0) - Status: EntityStatus.NO_POWER, Research: automation

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power supply
- Check the power supply status of your entities, especially for labs and electric machines, to ensure they are operational.
